meaning_str.bing:
adj. 惯用…手的；有…手的；有…人参加的
v. “hand”的过去式和过去分词
网络. 有手的；交给；单手可持

惯用…手的；有…手的；有…人参加的

给；传递；搀扶；支持；交给；处理；操作；经营；（hand的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: As I stood in his office, fingering the strap on my bag, Mr. Rader took out a business card and wrote something on it, then handed it to me.
1.cn: 当我站在他的办公室里用手指拨弄着背包的带子时，雷德先生取出一张名片，在上面写了一些什么，然后把它递给了我。

2.en: A well-known director was one of hot favorites to win an award . But he showed little disappointment after coming away empty-handed.
2.cn: 一位最有希望获奖的知名导演，却空手而回，显得有点失望。

3.en: This was a team of structure and confidence and, once they had taken the lead, the truth is they handed out a thrashing.
3.cn: 这只球队很有战术素养，并信心满满，只要一个闪光，就能取得领先。

0.en: So they handed me a cornett, which is fine by me because it's easier to play. The case was a lot lighter to carry around.
0.cn: 他们就给了我一个科尔内管，我欣然接受了，因为它更好演奏，琴箱也更轻更好拿。

1.en: Like, a little one, like a starter Mercedes. He had barely handed me the keys before he had to rush back to work. I didn't see him again till, like, pretty late that night.
1.cn: 那种小台，入门款的奔驰而已。他前脚刚把车钥匙给我后脚就得赶去上班。我就再也没见过他一直到那天深夜他才回来。

2.en: Cousin Kaidu, you forget the mandate Grandfather was handed from heaven.
2.cn: 海都兄弟，你忘了祖父的在天之灵交给我们的任务。

3.en: Oh yeah, you came up to me and asked if I could do you a favor, and my Uncle Murray came up to you and handed you a check.
3.cn: 对，你问我能不能帮你一个忙，这时墨瑞叔叔走过来，交给你一张支票。

4.en: A one-handed man with no family needs all the help he can get.
4.cn: 没有家族的独手汉需要有个依仗。

5.en: I have no idea, but X-rays alone could be a couple of handed dollars.
5.cn: 单是X光就可能得要两百元。

6.en: What do you mean? He's had everything he ever wanted just handed to him.
6.cn: 你什么意思？他以前想要的所有东西都有了。

7.en: America was built on the spirit of industry. You build your future. It isn't handed to you.
7.cn: 美国的根基是勤劳精神，未来靠自己努力，而非靠人施予。

8.en: We're all castoffs here. We've been dumped, donated, yard sales, second-handed and just plain thrown out.
8.cn: 我们都是弃儿，被抛弃，被捐赠... 宅前贱卖，二手交易 甚至赤裸裸地被丢弃

9.en: Where the data packets will be handed off to submerged trans-Atlantic cables, terminating in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
9.cn: 在那里数据将切换到跨大西洋海底电缆，最终汇聚到加拿大新斯科舍省的哈里法克斯。

10.en: It's to wash away the sorrows of the past year and welcome the new. A tradition handed down for nine hundred years.
10.cn: 那就是洗净过去一年的悲伤，迎接美好的未来。这个传统延续了九百多年。

11.en: Hey, Sheldon, you're always full of fun little facts. Where did the expression "got your ass handed to you" come from? Don't know.
11.cn: 谢尔顿，你不是知道很多小趣闻吗？"虐得你屁滚尿流"这句话语源是从哪来的啊？我不知道。

12.en: As we go about our days, as we gather with loved ones and friends, it's important to remember our way of life, the freedom, prosperity and security that we enjoy as Americans is not a gift that is simply handed to us.
12.cn: 当我们过着我们的日子，当我们与所爱的人和朋友们聚在一起，重要的是要记住我们的生活方式，我们作为美国人所享有的自由，繁荣和安全，这些不是简简单单交到我们手中的礼物。
